This place is the best place for tapas!! I stumbled upon this place, and I recalled my airbnb host recommending this place to me, so I decided to go in, which ended up being the best decision of my night!!The sangria is AMAZING and all of the tapas are so tasty!! It was 1€ for the clear plate tapas and 1.5€ for the black plate tapas. My boyfriend and I shared 1/2 liters of sangria and 18ish plates and it came to a total of 27€, which isn't bad split between 2 people and extremely filling!I would highly recommend this place to anyone looking for authentic tasty tapas in a relaxed environment, and delicious sangria :)
